fields.text: Thank you for calling Ninety Nine Designs, the global creative platform for custom graphic design based in the East Bay.
To start a new design contest, press [INDEX].
To launch a logo design contest, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our contests team for logo design.
To launch a website or other design contest, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our contests team for websites and other projects.
To hire a designer directly, press [INDEX].
To hire a designer for logo work, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our designer matching team for logo projects.
To hire a designer for website or other design services, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our designer matching team for websites and other design services.
